items.title: Amorim‚Äôs Manchester United future in balance amid Wilcox transfer tension
items.summary: Coach believed club would back him in January window Amorim had cast doubt on long-term future at United Ruben Amorim‚Äôs future at Manchester United is in the balance, with the head coach‚Äôs strained relationship with the director of football, Jason Wilcox, a factor in what is viewed as an unpredictable situation at the club. Amorim believed United were prepared to back him in the January transfer window should a major signing become available but at the moment this has changed, causing him discontent. The 40-year-old is believed to have been informed of this on the authority of Wilcox, who reports to Omar Berrada, the chief executive. Continue reading...

items.title: Amorim wants control at Man United, but his outburst could cost him his job
items.summary: Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim is frustrated at not being able to choose his transfers himself. But by speaking out, he has put his job in danger.

items.title: No Maresca, no problem? Chelsea's late draw at Man City a blow for Guardiola & Co.
items.summary: All signs pointed to a routine Man City win, yet Enzo Fernandez' late goal ensured Chelsea went home happy.

items.title: Amorim hits out: I'm Utd manager, not the coach
items.summary: Ruben Amorim has raised doubts over his future at Manchester United by saying he wants to be the "manager, not the coach."

items.title: Sources: Rosenior in London, close to Chelsea job
items.summary: Chelsea are moving closer to the appointment of Liam Rosenior as their new head coach after the 41-year-old arrived in London on Sunday, sources have told ESPN.

items.title: City injuries worry Pep: Gvardiol 'doesn't look good'
items.summary: Pep Guardiola said he has "concerns" after a number of defenders suffered injuries in a 1-1 draw with Chelsea in the Premier League on Sunday.

items.title: West Ham ontvangt miljoenen voor voormalig Feyenoord-target Guilherme
items.summary: Sporting Portugal heeft zondagavond de komst van Luis Guilherme bevestigd. De Braziliaan stond het afgelopen jaar nog in de belangstelling van Feyenoord, maar trekt nu van West Ham United naar Os Le√µes .

items.title: Djokovic cuts ties with players union he co-founded over 'ongoing concerns'
items.summary: Novak Djokovic has cut ties with the Professional Tennis Players Association, the players' union he co-founded.

items.summary: De Tunesische voetbalbond heeft bondscoach Sami Trabelsi per direct ontslagen, kort na de uitschakeling van het land in de achtste finale van de Afrika Cup tegen Mali. Die geruchten deden al de ronde.

items.title: Tension growing between Amorim and Man Utd hierarchy
items.summary: There is growing tension between Ruben Amorim and the hierarchy at Manchester United, including director of football Jason Wilcox.

items.title: Liam Rosenior arrives in London to discuss taking over as Chelsea manager
items.summary: Strasbourg manager, 41, to have talks on Monday He could be in place before Wednesday‚Äôs game at Fulham Chelsea are closing in on the appointment of Liam Rosenior after the Strasbourg manager flew to London to hold talks over the role. The 41-year-old is due to meet with the west London club on Monday and it is expected that discussions will end with him agreeing to replace Enzo Maresca, who left Stamford Bridge in acrimonious circumstances earlier this. items.title: Neville: Amorim not happy with hierarchy | Carra: He's not good enough
items.summary: Gary Neville believes Ruben Amorim's recent comments to the media are a signal that the Manchester United boss is not happy with the Old Trafford hierarchy.

items.title: Taylor banned from PDC events and prize money removed after failed drugs test
items.summary: Dom Taylor has been banned from all PDC events following his failed drugs test, the Darts Regulation Authority (DRA) have confirmed, while he has also been stripped of his World Darts Championship prize money.

items.title: City held at home as Chelsea snatch stoppage‚Äëtime equaliser
items.summary: Enzo Fernandez scores a stoppage-time equaliser as Chelsea end a tumultuous week by claiming a worthy Premier League point at title-chasing Manchester City.

items.title: Leeds denied win as Cunha hits back for Man Utd
items.summary: Brenden Aaronson breaks the deadlock, before Matheus Cunha levels just three minutes later, as Leeds and Manchester United share the points at Elland road.

items.title: Second‚Äëhalf lift sees Newcastle ease past Palace
items.summary: Newcastle United climb to ninth in the table, as captain Bruno Guimaraes inspires the hosts to victory with a hard-fought win over Crystal Palace at St James' Park.
